name: Yauali Puzzle
description:
This puzzle is similar to the rubik cube... but way better! The yauali puzzle is a circle with 16 pieces.

Move the pieces (up and down) and rotate them (left right). Align all pairs vertically.

¿Think you're smart enough for it? Prove it! The yauali awaits.

CONTROLS

-Rotation: Slide left and right to rotate all pieces at once. The "circles" with an empty space will not rotate.

-Move: Touch a piece and it will move up or down to the empty space.
